name: Expent Inc
headline: Procure the right software 5x faster
description: Expent is a marketplace that accelerates software procurement for teams, while giving organizations control over the entire purchasing process.

founders.name: Harikrishna Narayanan, Founder
founders.description: In 2020 Hari co-founded Expent. Prior to Expent, Hari was running the Machine Learning Services Product and Engineering group at Workday as a director where he was responsible for designing and executing the strategy & vision for multiple Machine Learning services. Before Workday, Hari led multiple data initiatives at Yahoo. Hari has a Masters in Computer Science from Georgia Institute of Technology and Bachelors from PSG Tech, India.

founders.name: Srikanth Veeraraghavan, Founder
founders.description: Srikanth is a co-founder of Expent. Prior to Expent, he was the Head of Security, Privacy and Compliance at PlanGrid. Prior to that, he was an early member of Zendesk’s Pre-IPO security team. He has more than 8+ years of extensive Security and Privacy experience working at various small, medium and large security companies. He has a Masters in Information Security from Johns Hopkins University and a Bachelors in Information Technology from Vellore Institute of Technology, India.

# Manage everything from sourcing to renewal of vendors in one platform
It takes many different products to procure & manage vendors. Now your teams can do it all with EXPENT.
![a black and white drawing of a man on a skateboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6535fdb1c3ba19b43f70630f_hero%20home.svg)

## Build a response process that scales with your business, improves collaboration, & helps you win more deals.
[Book a Demo](https://www.expent.ai/<#>)
## Expent makes every stage of the vendor lifecycle easier to manage
[VENDOR SELECTIONHelping you with your vendor selection process
  * Expent’s flexibility to run RFx or Proof of Concepts (PoC) makes vendor evaluation easy.
  * Expert-developed templates consider how vendors have been assessed by companies similar to your own, helping you make the easy choice.

![a black and white background with blue and white shapes](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6536232d03e27760e1e0ade0_Group%20427323158.webp)](https://www.expent.ai/</products/sourcing/vendor-selection>)[PROCUREMENTCentralize Intake, track unmanaged spend & assist purchase approval
  * Centralize the initiation of vendor & purchase requests.
  * Sourcing & Procurement workflows that loops in the right stakeholders; security, IT, legal, finance & procurement automatically.

![a screenshot of a web page with several people on it](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6536232d284b0413bfef4767_Group%20427324060.webp)](https://www.expent.ai/</products/sourcing/intake-to-procure>)[RISK MANAGEMENTAssess, track & manage vendor risk
  * With AI, quickly assess your vendor’s security posture.
  * Manage & Analyze all your vendor risk from Expent’s Risk Register.
  * Remove never-ending back & forths during vendor assessments.

![a screenshot of a dashboard showing a number of items](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6536232ec3ba19b43f96bc84_Group%20427324061.webp)](https://www.expent.ai/</products/risk-ai>)[PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENTVisualize & track vendor performance with QBR’s + Usage Analytics
  * One-click Surveys lets you collect feedback from internal teams & vendors.
  * Visualize vendor performance with intuitive dashboards.

![a bar chart with a star on top of it](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6536232ea24c9a3fff6e29d9_Group%20427324062.webp)](https://www.expent.ai/</products/vendor-management/performance-management>)[CONTRACT MANAGEMENTManage all vendor contracts & invoices
  * Expent’s AI parses out key data fields from vendor contracts.
  * The data is stored in vendor records saving you time spent on combing through cumbersome documents.

![a screenshot of a contact form](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6536232ea24c9a3fff6e29d6_Group%20427324063.webp)](https://www.expent.ai/</products/vendor-management/contract-management>)[RENEWALGet notified & never miss out on renewals
  * Timely notifications helps you stay updated on upcoming vendor renewals/key contractual terms.
  * Now, you have more time to review your vendor’s performance and negotiate terms that’s best for your business.

![a graphic showing the cost of spending and spending](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6536232e5bd4e630b57f5224_Group%20427324064.webp)](https://www.expent.ai/</products/vendor-management/renewal-management>)
[See Expent](https://www.expent.ai/<#footer-form>)
## Working across teams seamlessly
Procurement
[Procurement](https://www.expent.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Security & Compliance](https://www.expent.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[IT](https://www.expent.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[VMO](https://www.expent.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Sales](https://www.expent.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Finance](https://www.expent.ai/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
### Without Expent
Procurement teams struggle to enforce spend controls and struggle to keep up with multiple requests. Procurement being looped in late in the process diminishes their ability to be strategic.
![a bunch of conversation bubbles with a man in the middle](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/6513021ee5af9a1dbab90532_Group%20427323454.webp)

Purchase approval workflows are now automated with data-driven procurement workflows

### Without Expent
Security Teams have scarce resources and struggle to keep up with the number of vendor assessment requests resulting in them not being able to do a thorough defensible job of assessing the security posture of the vendors.
![a graphic of a star surrounded by other icons](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7100a9af6355345ba3afd/651302786ef2000d065c9340_Group%20427323397%20\(1\).webp)

### Without Expent
IT teams have to battle vendor sprawl, since vendor data is siloed, it’s hard to continually update and manage vendor data.

## Expent makes every stage of the vendor lifecycle easier to manage
VENDOR SELECTIONHelping you with your vendor selection process
  * Expent’s flexibility to run RFx or Proof of Concepts (PoC) makes vendor evaluation easy.
  * Expert-developed templates consider how vendors have been assessed by companies similar to your own, helping you make the easy choice.

![a black and white background with blue and white shapes⟨25⟩](https://www.expent.ai/</products/sourcing/vendor-selection>)PROCUREMENTCentralize Intake, track unmanaged spend & assist purchase approval
  * Centralize the initiation of vendor & purchase requests.
  * Sourcing & Procurement workflows that loops in the right stakeholders; security, IT, legal, finance & procurement automatically.

![a screenshot of a web page with several people on it⟨26⟩](https://www.expent.ai/</products/sourcing/intake-to-procure>)RISK MANAGEMENTAssess, track & manage vendor risk
  * With AI, quickly assess your vendor’s security posture.
  * Manage & Analyze all your vendor risk from Expent’s Risk Register.
  * Remove never-ending back & forths during vendor assessments.

![a screenshot of a dashboard showing a number of items⟨27⟩](https://www.expent.ai/</products/risk-ai>)PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENTVisualize & track vendor performance with QBR’s + Usage Analytics
  * One-click Surveys lets you collect feedback from internal teams & vendors.
  * Visualize vendor performance with intuitive dashboards.

![a bar chart with a star on top of it⟨28⟩](https://www.expent.ai/</products/vendor-management/performance-management>)CONTRACT MANAGEMENTManage all vendor contracts & invoices
  * Expent’s AI parses out key data fields from vendor contracts.
  * The data is stored in vendor records saving you time spent on combing through cumbersome documents.

![a screenshot of a contact form⟨29⟩](https://www.expent.ai/</products/vendor-management/contract-management>)RENEWALGet notified & never miss out on renewals
  * Timely notifications helps you stay updated on upcoming vendor renewals/key contractual terms.
  * Now, you have more time to review your vendor’s performance and negotiate terms that’s best for your business.

![a graphic showing the cost of spending and spending⟨30⟩](https://www.expent.ai/</products/vendor-management/renewal-management>)
See Expent⟨10⟩

### Without Expent
Procurement teams struggle to enforce spend controls and struggle to keep up with multiple requests. Procurement being looped in late in the process diminishes their ability to be strategic.
![a bunch of conversation bubbles with a man in the middle⟨37⟩]
### With Expent
Purchase approval workflows are now automated with data-driven procurement workflows

generated_description:
**Expent Inc: Streamlining Software Procurement**

Expent Inc, founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, is revolutionizing the way businesses procure software. With a mission to help organizations procure the right software five times faster, Expent serves as a marketplace that brings efficiency to the procurement process while giving teams ultimate control.

Based in Fremont, CA, with a lean team of just two employees, Expent is leveraging machine learning and SaaS technology to power its solutions. Their group partner is Michael Seibel, a notable figure in the startup ecosystem, which adds credibility to their venture.

### What They Do

At its core, Expent simplifies the software procurement lifecycle. They offer a comprehensive platform that manages everything from vendor sourcing to renewal management. Here's a quick overview of their key offerings:

- **Sourcing**: Streamlining vendor selection and onboarding.
- **Vendor Management**: Centralizing and optimizing vendor relations.
- **Risk Management**: Utilizing AI to assess and manage vendor security and compliance risks.
- **Approval Workflows**: Automating approval processes to speed up procurement timelines.
- **Software Asset Management**: Keeping track of software assets and managing contracts efficiently.

Their platform even includes vendor catalogs, performance management tools, and renewal management systems, which eliminate the need for multiple disparate tools.

### The Impact

The need for robust vendor management and procurement processes has never been more pressing. Organizations often face delays and inefficiencies due to siloed systems and lack of oversight. Expent tackles this by offering a unified platform that enhances collaboration across departments, improves visibility into vendor performance, and ensures compliance at every step.

Their solution appeals to various stakeholders in businesses—such as procurement, compliance, IT, and finance—making it a versatile tool for enhancing operational efficiency.

### Trust and Backing

Expent isn’t just another startup; it’s backed by a network of established investors, lending it significant credibility in the B2B space. Companies looking to streamline their procurement processes and minimize risks will find a valuable partner in Expent.

Expent’s website, [expent.ai](https://www.expent.ai/), provides further insights and the opportunity to book a demo, helping teams envision how they can transform their procurement processes.

In essence, if your organization is overwhelmed with vendor chaos, Expent is positioning itself as a savvy solution for making procurement smarter, faster, and more integrated.
